name: S.H.I.P.
text:
Alright Captain, We have a new job post! 
...

name: S.H.I.P.
text: We have been tasked to destroy the asteroids passing through the area. Not really our type of gig but, the job pays per asteroid, so we can make a few coin while we wait for another job to post.

name: S.H.I.P.
text: Lets go over a few things before we get started.

name: S.H.I.P.
text: Be sure to keep an eye on your Health Bar, not doing so will have fatal results!

name: S.H.I.P.
text: Your Energy Bar Needs to charge over time so be sure to manage this or you will not be able to fire your weapons

name: S.H.I.P.
text: Ok, now that we have gotten that out of the way... Lets get out there and make some easy coin!
